name: update-a-media-item
description: Update a previously created media item by ID.

description.description: A description of the media file.
description.example: This is a very important recording. Do not delete.

max_downloads_allowed.description: The maximum number of times the file may be downloaded. Unlimited when not provided.

metadata_primary.description: A string containing metadata about the media file.

metadata_secondary.description: A string containing further metadata about the media file.

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the media file.

public.description: Whether the item is publicly available without authentication.

title.description: A string containing a title for the media file.
